name: Faire L'Amour aux Plantes
description: Germinate plants and keep them alive with your delicious kisses! Half plant clicker game, half dating sim, half cottage core, and half Eraserhead, this game supports your wildest dreams.  Water, kiss, grow, and keep alive, and maybe one day you will finally get that exquisite smooch from Niel DeGrass Tyson that you've always dreamed of!!!
